item.title: Command coding help please :)
item.dc:creator: @Ikoedlalampara Ikoedlalampara
item.description:
@Ikoedlalampara wrote:

i would like the coding for the bank command to put on my client, You have to insert that into the server i cant do that at the moment dont feel like opening up files But you could try and search in your client.java file in your server files it might be in there aleady… also if you can please post alot of other command coding, look at other commands and see like it says if.commandEquals etc tele commands interface commands, inventory commands, glitch commands, should have atleast 1 in every server downloded, unless blank sources/blank from file… also im having trouble making my client public, upload it and advertise on mopar\google

and controlling what monsters drop. Depends on what type of server you are being delt with. and disabling the pickup command
Post what the section of the command in a picture or usnig the code box ( [code ] [/code ] (no space)
All you have to do is change the pickup command to 4534tnighn or whatever or just delete it…

Read full topic
